dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset containing 8 object categories (bottles, bowls, cans, jars, knives, cellphones, cameras, and remote controls) from ShapeNet. Each sample includes an annotated hand grasp with the corresponding ground-truth hand and object mesh.
dcterms:title: ObMan

dcterms:creator: Yu-Wei Chao
Wei Yang
Yu Xiang
Pavlo Molchanov
Ankur Handa
Jonathan Tremblay
Yashraj S Narang
Karl Van Wyk
Umar Iqbal
Stan Birchfield
dcterms:description: A testing dataset that includes multi-view video recordings of humans performing grasping of objects. The dataset contains 20 unique objects from the YCB-Video dataset, with samples in the S0 split where the minimum distance between the hand and the object mesh is less than 5mm.
dcterms:title: DexYCB
